name: PERSPEkTIVA
description:
PERSPEkTIVA is a breakout-like video game with a twist: you can see things from other angle and you have the power to slow the time.

With 9 levels is up to you how you want to win this game.

Linux and Mac builds are experimental.

Developed by Matias Beckerle.
Music by Secheron Peak.

Source code available on GitHub.
